div.p: Attention all BRHS students! The Blue Ridge High School Student Council is seeking newmembers for the 2020-2021 school year. Anyone wishing to run for an officer positionshould fill out the Google...
The Mansfield Alumni Association Banquet for 2020 has been cancelled!! Next year's banquet will be held on Saturday, April 24.
Thank you all for hanging in there with us while we take a break!Next week, March 23-27 is Spring Break! Please stay tuned for dates when we return back to school!

Welcome back to day #589 of remote learning (or maybe it just feels that way...). We miss being together at school and hope you all are finding ways to keep things fun and light! Today's daily announcement is posted at https://5il.co/fmsa. Have a wonderful day!

Monday is a School Improvement Day, so no student attendance, and no food deliveries. School resumes on Tuesday along with food deliveries. Remember May 4-8 is Education Appreciation Week. PIE created some great ideas for how to thank an educator at https://5il.co/fkln #br_u_knighted. Have a great week!

Today is a Remote Learning Planning Day. Teachers may choose to not assign new schoolwork. Meals will be delivered today. The daily announcement is posted at https://5il.co/fi19 and includes BRHS graduation plans. Have a wonderful weekend!

BRHS Graduation plans and related information are posted at https://5il.co/fh12. Plans include a program in the circle drive on May 17, and an in-person reception for the Class of 2020 later in summer when social distancing protocols are eased. #br_u_knighted
